French 'Spiderman' scales tower to support Philippines' South China Sea claimsA free climber known as the "French Spiderman" scaled a Manila skyscraper on Tuesday to support the Philippines' maritime claims in the disputed South China Sea. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 10:36:50 GMT SH4WIFUFBBNGXL3LD63CWIS27Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/french-spiderman-scales-tower-support-philippines-south-china-sea-claims-2024-03-05/Jay Ereno世界亚太地区
Portuguese builder Mota-Engil more than doubles 2023 profitMota-Engil more than doubled its 2023 net profit on record high sales, Portugal's largest builder said on Tuesday, while demand boosted its order book to an unprecedented 13 billion euros ($14.1 billion). Tue, 05 Mar 2024 09:36:59 GMT PVY7D2GQSVJ45LD6XC5QQDYKKQ https://www.reuters.com/business/portuguese-builder-mota-engil-more-than-doubles-2023-profit-2024-03-05/Reuters商业
Exclusive: Country Garden lenders' group hires advisers for debt revamp talksA group of lenders to China's Country Garden has hired Allen & Overy and Deloitte as advisers, three sources with knowledge of the matter said, as creditors to the embattled developer gear up for possible debt restructuring talks. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 09:24:43 GMT XC6P2IFNBNJLBOT37PO4JDN5KI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/country-garden-lenders-group-hires-advisers-debt-revamp-talks-sources-say-2024-03-05/Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim世界中国
Taiwan urges dialogue with China without political preconditionsTaiwan's Mainland Affairs Council on Tuesday urged China to accept the fact that the two sides are not subordinate to each other, after Beijing hardened its stance on the island in a government work report. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 08:46:36 GMT O36HPGLUJFMQVGET72KSP7H73M https://www.reuters.com/world/taiwan-urges-dialogue-with-china-without-political-preconditions-2024-03-05/Reuters世界
European shares fall over lacklustre Chinese stimulus, economic data in focusEuropean shares moved lower on Tuesday as pledges by China to transform its economy amid stuttering growth failed to impress investors, while markets grew cautious ahead of a string of euro zone and U.S. economic data. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 08:16:50 GMT 2CUHYWQQZFIMZFAYM2LVHG7PM4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/european-shares-fall-over-underwhelming-chinese-stimulus-data-tap-2024-03-05/Khushi Singh市场欧洲市场
Volvo Cars posts 2% slide in February sales volumeVolvo Cars' sales fell 2% in February from a year earlier to 50,315 cars, the Sweden-based group said on Tuesday, pointing to the timing of the Lunar New Year in China as the main explanation for the decline. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 08:06:10 GMT TG5ULIPB5JLYBAXYHGYH444FII https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/volvo-cars-february-sales-volume-down-2-year-on-year-2024-03-05/Louise Rasmussen商业汽车与交通
